results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project b7c1780ed1604fd78504259a764b3761. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users cannot log in when their passwords contain special characters.
arguments.success_criteria: All character types should be supported for login, with regression tests implemented.

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 86225e3cfa364b8587df61c029c6c0ab:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.

arguments.title: Write fix and add regression tests

results.prompt_sent: Save a context note on workunit 86225e3cfa364b8587df61c029c6c0ab recording this decision: we chose to fix the password validation on the backend rather than the frontend, because it's more secure. This is a high-importance architectural decision.
